home.title: Welcome to RetoMates
home.subtitle: Your personal math challenge partner. Master arithmetic with fun, adaptive practice designed to build confidence and skills.
home.featuresSubtitle: RetoMates is built on proven learning principles to help you succeed.
home.feature1Description: Problems adjust to your level, keeping you challenged but not overwhelmed.
home.feature2Description: Master core skills with fun challenges and immediate, helpful feedback.
home.feature3Description: Watch your skills grow, earn stars for mastery, and build your streak.

practice.title: Practice Mode
practice.constructionSubtitle: This is where the magic will happen. Get ready for some math challenges!
practice.dailyMissionConstruction: Daily Mission is coming soon. Check back later!

smartPractice.title: Smart Practice
smartPractice.description: Adaptive challenges in a skill of your choice.

dailyMission.title: Daily Mission
dailyMission.description: A quick mix of skills to keep your mind sharp.

unitBoss.title: Unit Boss
unitBoss.description: Prove your mastery and earn the final star!

divisibility.name: Divisibility Rules
divisibility.description: Learn the rules for 2, 3, 5, and more.
